RECTOR AND VICE RECTORS

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”full_width” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern” z_index=””][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1575835851507{padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1710925231032{background-color: #ffffff !important;}” el_class=”content-section curved-bottom-right space16″]

According to the arrangements of article 15 of National Law 4485/2017, Government Gazette 114 A’ “Organization and operation of higher education, research arrangements and other provisions” the Rector is a first rank faculty member (i.e., Full Professor) elected for a period of three years. Vice Rectors are also faculty first or second rank faculty members (i.e., Full or Associate Professor) elected for the same term of service. The decision appointing the Vice Rectors specifies the order in which they act in place of the Rector in case he or she is absent or unable for any reason to carry out the duties of the Rector. The number of Vice Rectors is determined by the Institution’s Regulations and Procedures.

There are four Vice Rector positions at UNIWA, the Vice Rector for Academic and Student Affairs, the Vice Rector for Finance, Planning and Development, the Vice Rector for Administrative Affairs, and the Vice Rector for Research and Lifelong Learning.

The first Rectorate Elections of the newly established University of West Attica were held in May 2019. The Rectorate Authorities comprise:

The Rector

  • Panagiotis Kaldis. Full Professor of the Department of Wine, Vine and Beverage Science, in School of Food Sciences

 

Vice Rectors

  • Petros Kalantonis. Vice Rector. Full Professor of the Department of Tourism Management, School of Administrative, Economics and Social Sciences.
  • Aristides Papagrigoriou. Vice Rector. Associate Professor of the Department of Tourism Management, School of Administrative, Economics and Social Sciences.
  • Stavros Kaminaris. Vice Rector. Full Professor of the Department of the Department of Electrical and Electronic Engineering, School of Engineering.
  • Theodoros Xanthos. Vice Rector. Full Professor of the Department of Midwifery, School of Health and Care Sciences.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
